data.title: Responding to Application Deficiencies in the Cultivation Licensing System (CLS)
data.excerpt: What is a Deficiency? The Department of Cannabis Control (DCC) Licensing Division will issue a deficiency notification(s) if it is determined that your application requires additional information.  Once the main application, all owner applications, the Declarations and Final Affidavit, and the application fee are submitted, the DCC will review the entirety for deficiencies. A deficiency […]
